content.rendered:
Inspire. Integrate. Ignite -the theme of World FM Day 2024.

On this special day, TTE Facilities Management acknowledged the invaluable contribution of every team member. The senior management of TTE FM distributed refreshing fruits and juices to our workmen at accommodations, appreciating their hard work and reminded them to stay hydrated, especially during the upcoming summer. The team also engaged in a friendly football match amongst our cross-functional teams which promoted collaboration and integration.
